channel.title: Dds-specz - amazing features - 2000 downloads
channel.description:
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2je2xkn.png[/img]
[i][b]Right now it's double xp which is 2000 xp per hit![/b][/i] [i][b]Pictures and download link down the bottom[/b][/i]
[img]http://runescape.siteguides.net/free/cursors/images/magic.png[/img]Magic System[img]http://runescape.siteguides.net/free/cursors/images/magic.png[/img] Perfect magic following perfect delays perfect gfx Instant freezing zuriel and void effects
[img]http://runescape.siteguides.net/free/cursors/images/range.png[/img]Range System[img]http://runescape.siteguides.net/free/cursors/images/range.png[/img] Perfect d bow delays Ranging following Better hits with range Avas accum works 100% New magic short bow and new karils bow emotes Perfect rune c bow with special
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/okdcm0.gif[/img]Melee System[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/okdcm0.gif[/img] I pretty much only added new emotes/gfxs, changed maxhits added a few armor, weapons and updated melee following New whip, GS, Anchor, Rune Defender, Dragon Claws, Emotes Anchor GFXS All Godsword GFXS including SS Piety, Chivarly, Ultimate strength all of these are perfected Special attacks are perfected Instant DDS Spec Dragon scimitar spec drops prayer Zamorak spear with it actuall spec has been added
other Pvp features
-PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect -MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote, Whip, D Claws.) -Green dragon PK'ing which is very active. -Every PVP Armor has been added, you can obtain these by getting your PK Points up -Wilderness Obelisk is now 100% -Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect -Amazing PKING, one of the top i believe -Wilderness levels and alot of active PKers
[b]Client[/b]:
[b]Forums:[/b]

item.title: Dds-specz - amazing features - 2000 downloads
item.dc:creator: @bombs_pure bombs pure
item.description:
@bombs_pure wrote:

Right now it’s double xp which is 2000 xp per hit!
Pictures and download link down the bottom

Magic System
Perfect magic following
perfect delays
perfect gfx
Instant freezing
zuriel and void effects

Range System
Perfect d bow delays
Ranging following
Better hits with range
Avas accum works 100%
New magic short bow and new karils bow emotes
Perfect rune c bow with special

Melee System
I pretty much only added new emotes/gfxs, changed maxhits added a few armor, weapons and updated melee following
New whip, GS, Anchor, Rune Defender, Dragon Claws, Emotes
Anchor GFXS
All Godsword GFXS including SS
Piety, Chivarly, Ultimate strength all of these are perfected
Special attacks are perfected
Instant DDS Spec
Dragon scimitar spec drops prayer
Zamorak spear with it actuall spec has been added

other Pvp features

-PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect
-MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote, Whip, D Claws.)
-Green dragon PK’ing which is very active.
-Every PVP Armor has been added, you can obtain these by getting your PK Points up
-Wilderness Obelisk is now 100%
-Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect
-Amazing PKING, one of the top i believe
-Wilderness levels and alot of active PKers
